title: Drag n Drop Selector
shortDescription: Allow users to select and save elements from a list of options by dragging and dropping.

longDescription.issue: Previous versions of this component was a list of dropdowns, which was not user-friendly.
longDescription.solution: Built an Angular-based frontend with a Node.js/Express backend, and used SQL for data storage. Created a custom drag and drop component to display a list of options allowing users to filter and choose options by highlighting multiple lines and drag them to another list to save them. A version of this is used by thousands of employees at a large top 100 company for schedule preferences.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Learned the importance of optimizing API calls for performance and building a custom component that needed to be added to a larger, previously built project.

title: YelpCamp
shortDescription: MERN Full-stack web application for saving and reviewing camp sites.

longDescription.issue: Yelp is very popular for finding and reviewing businesses, but it is difficult to find and review them.
longDescription.solution: Built a React-based frontend with a Node.js/Express backend, and used MongoDB for data storage.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Learned React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Bootstrap CSS.
longDescription.extraInfo: You may create a free account on the website to test the application.

title: Bob's Computer Repair
shortDescription: MEAN Full-Stack web application for computer repair shop.

longDescription.issue: Bob's Computer Repair needed an affordable, scalable online store with a shopping cart and the possibility of secure payments.
longDescription.solution: Built a React-based frontend with a Node.js/Express backend, and used MongoDB for data storage. Lead a team of 3 developers to build a full-stack shopping cart for a made-up company. I designed the look and feel of the website, helped build the backend, and tested the application.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Learned Angular stack, waterfall development, and the importance of testing.
longDescription.extraInfo: Demo credentials: Standard User > username: [mozart], password: [Password01] | Admin User > username: [bach], password: [Password01]

title: Contact Pro
shortDescription: .NET Full-stack web application for collecting contacts.

longDescription.issue: Needed a full-stack web application that allows users to create, edit, and delete contacts.
Needed a simple ToDo web application that allows users to create, edit, and delete tasks to keep track of class assignments.
longDescription.solution: Built a React-based frontend with a Node.js/Express backend, and used MongoDB for data storage. I designed the look and feel of the website, utilized AI to generate images for the ToDo list, and tested the application.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Learned Angular stack, AI image generation, and the importance of testing.

title: Teams Tracker
shortDescription: Angular Front-end web application for tracking Teams members.

longDescription.issue: Zoom calls have the ability to move participants around, Microsoft Teams does not.
longDescription.solution: Built a Angular-based frontend web app that allows users to track Teams members and move them around by dragging and dropping them. I designed the look and feel of the website, and tested the application. This is still be used by a large top 100 company for daily stand-up meetings
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Learned Drag and Drop, Angular, and CSS.

title: CSS Animations
shortDescription: CSS animations that create cool effects.

longDescription.issue: Practicing cool effects with CSS animations.
longDescription.solution: Built a collection of CSS animations that create cool effects. I designed the look and feel of the website, and tested the application.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Learned new CSS and javascript animations

title: Digital Elegance
shortDescription: Personal portfolio website for Digital Elegance.

longDescription.issue: Needed a new personal portfolio website for Digital Elegance.
longDescription.solution: Built a React-based frontend to show off my skills and projects. I designed the look and feel of the website and created all the projects featured. Also, created a Wordpress portion to showcase and sell my photographic art work.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Learned React, Bootstrap, CSS, and Wordpress.

title: Lizvitation
shortDescription: My Daughter's Harry Potter Themed Wedding Invitation.

longDescription.issue: Needed a Harry Potter Themed Wedding Invitation that was personalized to each invitee.
longDescription.solution: Built a javascript-based frontend website that pulls information from a url and customizes the invitation based on the information. I designed the look and feel of the invitation and utilized Adobe Photoshop to create the background images and javascript for moving svg footprints.
longDescription.lessonsLearned: Learned new skills in javascript, css, and photoshop.
